itunes:title: Diet Book Deep Dive: Ed McMahon’s “Slimming Down”
title: Diet Book Deep Dive: Ed McMahon’s “Slimming Down”
description:
This week is our first  Diet Book Deep Dive, where we dig into some of the worst and wildest weight loss advice we can find.  First up: Tonight Show sidekick Ed McMahon's pun, alcohol and misogyny-fueled diet plan from the 1970s. Hope you like broiled steak and Sanka!

Clips!

  • Ed McMahon & Britney Spears on Star Search
  • Ed McMahon for American Family Sweepstakes

Support us:

  •  Subscribe on Patreon
  • Donate on PayPal
  • Get Maintenance Phase shirts, stickers and more


Thanks to Lynn Barbera for editing assistance and Doctor Dreamchip for our lovely theme song!

Support the show (https://www.patreon.com/maintenancephase)
